dialogData.line: Hey.
Hey, idiot.
Do you even know were you're going?

replies.line: I'm fine, I'll figure it out.

dialogData.line: Wow, that's careless.

replies.line: I'll be alright.

dialogData.line: Running ahead aimlessly. Typical.
You're going to get us lost. Again.

replies.line: Nobody asked for your opinion

dialogData.line: You don't even know where we are. You'll never make it through the night.

replies.line: Hardly the first time I slept outdoors.
Or worse, I'll make it through and you'll still be here.

dialogData.line: You'll end up just another girl disappeared in the clouds.

replies.line: Don't worry, I'll find my way.
Why don't you disappear in a crack in the ground and never show your face again?

dialogData.line: You say these things but you don't mean them.

replies.line: I'm quite capable of knowing my own mind.
Oh, I do mean them. Fiercely.

dialogData.line: Well, that's it. No chance you'll make it through that.

replies.line: Shut the hell up!

dialogData.line: Oh, she's pissed now. Bravo. That's soooo constructive.

replies.line: I have good reasons to feel that way.
Not fun to reap what you sow, is it?
Keep that up, I'll show you what destructive looks like!

dialogData.line: Got that out of your system? Little tantrum over?

replies.line: I don't need to justify myself.
Better to throw tantrums than to end up like you.
You've seen nothing yet, you little creep!

dialogData.line: You know, if you had self-control, maybe that little mishap back home wouldn't have happened.

replies.line: That's not fair.
Don't you dare bring that up.
I have the self-control not to blacken your eye!

dialogData.line: Then again, careful never really was your thing, right?

replies.line: Everyone makes mistakes.
Not careful enough to avoid meeting you, tragically.
You be careful what you say if you want to keep your teeth!

dialogData.line: What are you mad at me for? It was your fault.

replies.line: I was only trying to help.
Don't start commenting things you know nothing about.
You wouldn't recognize fault if I slapped your head with it!

dialogData.line: So you run away from your problems rather than confront them. So predictable.

replies.line: It's better not to cause unnecessary conflicts.
If I wanted to talk about it, I'd go to someone I actually respect.
If you insist, I can confront my fist with your face!

dialogData.line: Come to think of it, you're right. Don't talk about it.
You'd screw that up like you screw everything up.
You're a failure. You know it, I know it, everybody knows it.
That's why none of them will even talk to you anymore.

replies.line: We'll mend things eventually.
If only you would do the same.
You can talk to my knuckles, if you'd prefer!

dialogData.line: Admit it : it's better that way.
If you stayed it would have gone even worse.
At the end of the day, I'm the only who still wants you around.

replies.line: Enough! What are you even doing here?

dialogData.line: Huh?

replies.line: I didn't ask for this! I didn't ask for you to squat into my head!

dialogData.line: Wow, where's that coming from? I'm only looking out for you!

replies.line: You only want to play your dirty tricks on my mind!

dialogData.line: ... You need me.

replies.line: I don't need you. I never needed you.
You're just a pathetic waste of space.
Go back to hell where you belong!
